[00:17.12]Yeah
[00:18.87]F**k your love f**k it I don't want none of it
[00:21.80]Yeah
[00:23.17]F**k your trust f**k it
[00:24.27]F**k your trust no
[00:24.86]I don't want none of it no
[00:26.72]Yeah
[00:27.70]F**k you f**k you I don't need your love ho yeah
[00:34.78]Yeah but who needs love
[00:36.32]Love
[00:37.06]That ain't never changed s**t
[00:38.23]Yeah
[00:38.60]Still the same I never changed b***h
[00:40.48]Yeah
[00:40.74]I been rollin' 'round with the same clique
[00:42.66]I been rollin' 'round with the gang b***h
[00:44.89]Gang b***h
[00:45.18]F**k your squad and who you came with
[00:46.94]In a foreign car I'm switchin' lanes quick
[00:49.28]And I'm destined for this f**king greatness ayy
[00:52.25]Yeah
[00:52.42]And I don't got time for a b***h
[00:54.32]That's gon' slow a n***a like me down
[00:56.47]'Cause I keep on speed racin' to the motherf**king cash n***a
[00:59.13]I'm a f**kin' cash cow oh
[01:01.71]Stuntin' like my motherf**king daddy b***h

[01:03.71]Spent a hunnid on a ring and a Patek wrist
[01:05.33]On a Patek wrist yeah
[01:06.12]And the choppa on my hip is automatic b***h
[01:07.57]Automatic b***h yeah
[01:07.95]Get the brrah get the blastin' s**t
[01:09.91]Bah yeah
[01:13.67]Don't f**k with me don't say that
[01:17.01]Don't say that
[01:18.02]That bulls**t shawty save that
[01:21.49]Save that
[01:22.47]I knew shawty since way back
[01:26.43]Way back when I was eatin' it up beatin' it up ayy
[01:30.02]Woo
[01:30.36]Eatin' it up beatin' it up ayy
[01:32.09]Woo
[01:32.54]Feastin' it up feastin' it up ayy
[01:34.33]Woo
[01:34.73]Livin' it up livin' it up ayy
[01:36.97]We did it yeah we did it yeah ayy
[01:38.99]Yeah yeah
[01:39.65]Still the same though
[01:41.33]Yeah
[01:41.75]Still the same ho
[01:43.23]Okay yeah
[01:46.92]F**k your love f**k it I don't want none of it
[01:49.83]Yeah
[01:51.14]F**k your trust f**k it
[01:52.34]F**k your trust no
[01:52.85]I don't want none of it no
[01:54.72]Yeah
[01:55.72]F**k you f**k you I don't need your love ho yeah
[02:02.97]Yeah but who needs love
[02:04.36]Love
[02:05.12]That ain't never changed s**t
[02:06.28]Yeah
[02:06.64]Still the same I never changed b***h

data.trans:
[ti:Who Needs Love (Explicit)]
[ar:Trippie Redd]
[al:Who Needs Love (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.70]//
[00:11.41]//
[00:17.12]//
[00:18.87]对你的爱嗤之以鼻 我什么都不想要
[00:21.80]//
[00:23.17]对你的信任不屑一顾
[00:24.27]你的信任不值一提
[00:24.86]我什么都不想要
[00:26.72]//
[00:27.70]你滚开 我不需要你的爱
[00:34.78]可谁需要爱呢
[00:36.32]//
[00:37.06]这事实从未改变
[00:38.23]//
[00:38.60]我还是原来的样子 从未改变
[00:40.48]//
[00:40.74]我身边都是深交多年的朋友
[00:42.66]我一直和同一帮人混在一起
[00:44.89]//
[00:45.18]让你的队伍还有追随你的人离我远点
[00:46.94]开着进口车 我迅速地变换车道
[00:49.28]我是天之骄子 注定成就一番大事业
[00:52.25]//
[00:52.42]我没时间谈情说爱
[00:54.32]像我这样的人一定会禁不起诱惑
[00:56.47]我忙得不可开交 总是抓紧时间挣钱
[00:59.13]我可是摇钱树 大家都指望着我
[01:01.71]像我老爸一样四处炫耀
[01:03.04]和爸爸如出一辙
[01:03.71]一掷千金 买了戒指和百达翡丽的腕表
[01:05.33]买了百达翡丽的腕表
[01:06.12]我身后别着全自动手枪
[01:07.57]全自动的
[01:07.95]纠集一帮人 大杀四方
[01:09.91]//
[01:13.67]别挑衅我 别口出狂言
[01:17.01]别口出狂言
[01:18.02]胡说八道 美女 别白费唇舌
[01:21.49]省省力气
[01:22.47]我早就对她了若指掌
[01:26.43]回忆往昔 我们尽情放纵 激情缠绵
[01:30.02]//
[01:30.36]我们尽情放纵 激情缠绵
[01:32.09]//
[01:32.54]享受欢愉时刻 享受欢愉时刻
[01:34.33]//
[01:34.73]尽情享受 尽情享受
[01:36.97]我出人头地 我出人头地
[01:38.99]//
[01:39.65]可我还是老样子
[01:41.33]//
[01:41.75]我还是老样子
[01:43.23]好吧
[01:46.92]对你的爱嗤之以鼻 我什么都不想要
[01:49.83]//
[01:51.14]对你的信任不屑一顾
[01:52.34]你的信任不值一提
[01:52.85]我什么都不想要
[01:54.72]//
[01:55.72]你滚开 我不需要你的爱
[02:02.97]可谁需要爱呢
[02:04.36]//
[02:05.12]这事实从未改变
[02:06.28]//
[02:06.64]我还是原来的样子 从未改变
[02:08.50]//
[02:08.65]我身边都是深交多年的朋友
[02:10.78]我一直和同一帮人混在一起
[02:12.98]//
[02:13.27]让你的队伍还有追随你的人离我远点
[02:15.23]开着进口车 我迅速地变换车道
[02:17.28]我是天之骄子 注定成就一番大事业
[02:20.36]//
